content:
I think there's been a misunderstanding! I apologize for any confusion. As a digital AI assistant, I don't have personal experiences, wear a Ava bracelet, or track menstrual cycles and fertility windows. I exist solely to provide information and assist with inquiries to the best of my abilities.

However, I can provide you with information about the Ava bracelet and its features. The Ava bracelet is a wearable device that tracks various physiological parameters, such as skin temperature, heart rate, and sleep patterns, to predict ovulation and provide insights into menstrual cycles and fertility windows. It's known for its accuracy and ability to provide personalized insights, making it a popular choice among women trying to conceive or track their menstrual cycles.

If you have any questions about the Ava bracelet or any other fertility tracking methods, feel free to ask, and I'll do my best to help!
